00027 template<> inline DataIStream& DataIStream::operator >> ( std::string& str )
00028 {
00029     uint64_t nElems = 0;
00030     *this >> nElems;
00031     const uint64_t maxElems = getRemainingBufferSize();
00032     LBASSERTINFO( nElems <= maxElems,
00033                   nElems << " > " << maxElems );
00034     if( nElems == 0 )
00035         str.clear();
00036     else if( nElems <= maxElems )
00037         str.assign( static_cast< const char* >( getRemainingBuffer(nElems)),
00038                     size_t( nElems ));
00039     else
00040         str.assign(
00041             static_cast< const char* >( getRemainingBuffer(maxElems)),
00042                 size_t( maxElems ));
00043 
00044     return *this;
00045 }
00046 
00048 template<> inline DataIStream& DataIStream::operator >> ( Object*& object )
00049 {
00050     ObjectVersion data;
00051     *this >> data;
00052     LBASSERT( object->getID() == data.identifier );
00053     object->sync( data.version );
00054     return *this;
00055 }

00058 template< class T >
00059 void DataIStream::_readArray( Array< T > array, const boost::true_type& )
00060 {
00061     _read( array.data, array.getNumBytes( ));
00062     _swap( array );
00063 }
00064 
00066 template< class T >
00067 void DataIStream::_readArray( Array< T > array, const boost::false_type&)
00068 {
00069     for( size_t i = 0; i < array.num; ++i )
00070         *this >> array.data[ i ];
00071 }
00072 
00073 template< class T > inline DataIStream&
00074 DataIStream::operator >> ( lunchbox::Buffer< T >& buffer )
00075 {
00076     uint64_t nElems = 0;
00077     *this >> nElems;
00078     LBASSERTINFO( nElems < LB_BIT48,
00079                   "Out-of-sync co::DataIStream: " << nElems << " elements?" );
00080     buffer.resize( nElems );
00081     return *this >> Array< T >( buffer.getData(), nElems );
00082 }

00084 
00085 template< class T > inline DataIStream&
00086 DataIStream::operator >> ( std::vector< T >& value )
00087 {
00088     uint64_t nElems = 0;
00089     *this >> nElems;
00090     value.resize( nElems );
00091     for( uint64_t i = 0; i < nElems; ++i )
00092         *this >> value[i];
00093     return *this;
00094 }
00095 
00096 template< class K, class V > inline DataIStream&
00097 DataIStream::operator >> ( std::map< K, V >& map )
00098 {
00099     map.clear();
00100     uint64_t nElems = 0;
00101     *this >> nElems;
00102     for( uint64_t i = 0; i < nElems; ++i )
00103     {
00104         typename std::map< K, V >::key_type key;
00105         typename std::map< K, V >::mapped_type value;
00106         *this >> key >> value;
00107         map.insert( std::make_pair( key, value ));
00108     }
00109     return *this;
00110 }

00112 template< class T > inline DataIStream&
00113 DataIStream::operator >> ( std::set< T >& value )
00114 {
00115     value.clear();
00116     uint64_t nElems = 0;
00117     *this >> nElems;
00118     for( uint64_t i = 0; i < nElems; ++i )
00119     {
00120         T item;
00121         *this >> item;
00122         value.insert( item );
00123     }
00124     return *this;
00125 }

00160 class ObjectFinder
00161 {
00162 public:
00163     ObjectFinder( const UUID& id ) : _id( id ) {}
00164     bool operator()( co::Object* candidate )
00165         { return candidate->getID() == _id; }
00166 
00167 private:
00168     const UUID _id;
00169 };
00170 }

00172 template<> inline void DataIStream::_swap( Array< void > ) const { /*NOP*/ }

00174 template< typename O, typename C > inline void
00175 DataIStream::deserializeChildren( O* object, const std::vector< C* >& old_,
00176                                   std::vector< C* >& result )
00177 {
00178     ObjectVersions versions;
00179     *this >> versions;
00180     std::vector< C* > old = old_;
00181 
00182     // rebuild vector from serialized list
00183     result.clear();
00184     for( ObjectVersions::const_iterator i = versions.begin();
00185          i != versions.end(); ++i )
00186     {
00187         const ObjectVersion& version = *i;
00188 
00189         if( version.identifier == UUID( ))
00190         {
00191             result.push_back( 0 );
00192             continue;
00193         }
00194 
00195         typename std::vector< C* >::iterator j =
00196             lunchbox::find_if( old, ObjectFinder( version.identifier ));
00197 
00198         if( j == old.end( )) // previously unknown child
00199         {
00200             C* child = 0;
00201             object->create( &child );
00202             LocalNodePtr localNode = object->getLocalNode();
00203             LBASSERT( child );
00204             LBASSERT( !object->isMaster( ));
00205 
00206             LBCHECK( localNode->mapObject( child, version ));
00207             result.push_back( child );
00208         }
00209         else
00210         {
00211             C* child = *j;
00212             old.erase( j );
00213             if( object->isMaster( ))
00214                 child->sync( VERSION_HEAD );
00215             else
00216                 child->sync( version.version );
00217 
00218             result.push_back( child );
00219         }
00220     }
00221 
00222     while( !old.empty( )) // removed children
00223     {
00224         C* child = old.back();
00225         old.pop_back();
00226         if( !child )
00227             continue;
00228 
00229         if( child->isAttached() && !child->isMaster( ))
00230         {
00231             LocalNodePtr localNode = object->getLocalNode();
00232             localNode->unmapObject( child );
00233         }
00234         object->release( child );
00235     }
00236 }
